frameset.edef: to spoil or impair, to blame fault

example.parse: (TOP (SQ (ADJP-PRD (PRT (NEG_PART مِش)) (NOUN حَرام)) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ إِنّ) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NP (PRON_1P نا)) (PP (PREP ك) (NP (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL مَصرِييِن)))) (VP (IV1P+IV نِسَوَء) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG سُمعَة) (NP (NOUN وَطَن) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا)))) (PP (PREP بِ) (NP (DET+NOUN الباطِل)))))) (PUNC ?)))
